oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Modelling runoff and erosion in agricultural soil: application of ICECREAM model to a field site in southern Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paasonen-Kivek채s, Maija
Koivusalo, Harri
B채rlund, Ilona
Tattari, Sirkka
Alakukku, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The hydrological submodel of ICECREAM, which is the Finnish version of CREAMS/GLEAMS model was calibrated and validated against surface runoff and snow water equivalent data from a sloping clayey field under small grain crop cultivation. The field data indicated pronounced short-term and seasonal variation of surface runoff and erosion. Soil loss was modelled using either simulated or measured surface runoff as an input data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Paasonen-Kivek채s, Maija; Koivusalo, Harri; B채rlund, Ilona; Tattari, Sirkka and Alakukku, Laura (2006) Modelling runoff and erosion in agricultural soil: application of ICECREAM model to a field site in southern Finland. Paper at: Transport and retention of pollutants from different production systems : NJF seminar 373, Tartu, Estonia, 11-14 June 2006.
